Nordlund]] | children = | website = www.centern.ax }} {{Politics of Åland}} '''Roger Nordlund''' (born November 19, 1957) is a politician in the [[Åland|Åland Islands]], an autonomous and unilingually [[Swedish language|Swedish]] territory of [[Finland]]. Roger Nordlund is currently serving as Deputy Premier [[Government of Åland]] and Minister of Finance. *[[Deputy premier]] ([[Vice lantråd]]), Government of Åland 2011- *[[Speaker (politics)|Speaker]], [[Parliament of Åland]] 2007- 2011 *[[Premier]] ([[lantråd]]), [[Government of Åland]] 1999-2007 *[[Deputy premier]] ([[Vice lantråd]]), Government of Åland 1995-1999 *Minister of education and culture, Government of Åland 1991-1995 *Member of the Lagting ([[Parliament of Åland]]) 1983-1987 *Chairman of the Åland Centre Party 1986-1987, and 1997–2007 ==See also== *[[Government of Åland]] *[[Parliament of Åland]] ==External links== *[http://www.lagtinget.ax// The Åland Parliament] {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME =Nordlund, Roger | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Premier of Åland | DATE OF BIRTH =November 19, 1957 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Nordlund, Roger}} [[Category:1957 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Premiers of Åland]] [[Category:Politicians from Åland]] {{Åland-stub}} {{Finland-politician-stub}}
